summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 10008, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Dayton Avenue, from Kilbourne Street to North Thirty-ninth Street, in the City of Seattle, by the construction of a water main of proper dimensions, in accordance with Resolution of the City Council of the City of Seattle, No. 722, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by an act of the Legislature of the State of Washington, entitled "An act authorizing the issuance and sale of bonds by cities, to pay for local improvements, providing for the payment thereof, and declaring an emergency," approved March 14, 1899, and Ordinance No. 5693 said city, approved December 6, 1899."
